summary: AN ORDINANCE removing various 2005 budget provisos; lifting restrictions on spending for the South Downtown Hygiene and Homeless Services Center and for Fire Facilities, and eliminating a duplicative proviso.
vote: 1-8 (Yes: Drago; No: Compton, Conlin, Della, Godden, Licata, McIver, Rasmussen, Steinbrueck)
note: Hygiene Center Budget Proviso Lift, South Downtown Service Center Budget Proviso Lift
